section.title: Exceptions
section.para:
Again used by the core components, the exceptions can still be used from the library. Currently, Majisti provides those kind of exceptions:
NotImplementedException When something is not implemented yet.
UnsupportedOperationException For unsupported operations. Use carefully as it is argued that throwing more exceptions in descending classes inheritence is prohibited by some practitionners. The exception to this is often the unsupported operation exception, hence its presence.
